com.magknight.projection

Class FlatPlaneProjection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magknight.projection.FlatPlaneProjection

  • public class FlatPlaneProjection
extends java.lang.Object
    FlatPlaneProjection implements a projection system to project the earth onto a flat cartesian grid for easier calculations. Provides methods for conversions between geographical and cartesian coordinates. Initial implementation used from Skiselkov's openFMC repo.
    Since:
    5/19/2020
    Author:
    Cian Mc Sweeney
    See Also:
    openFMC implementation

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlatPlaneProjection

        public FlatPlaneProjection(LatLon center,
                           double rot,
                           double distance,
                           Ellipsoid ellipsoid,
                           boolean allowInverse)
        Initialize a projection with a specified parameters
        Parameters:
        center - center location (pole of the projection).
        rot - rotation of the projection in degrees.
        distance - distance factor for projection.
        ellipsoid - Ellipsoid to use for projection
        allowInverse - allow conversion from cartesian to spherical coordinates.

        distance - distance factor for projection.
        ellipsoid - Ellipsoid to use for projection
        allowInverse - allow conversion from cartesian to spherical coordinates.
